doubleTap.name: Double Tap
doubleTap.description: Shoot twice the bullets, but not for free.

quickShots.name: Quick Shots
quickShots.description: Increases the velocity of the projectiles shot from your primary weapon

virus.name: Virus
virus.description: When you leave an enemy, they die after 3 seconds

highCalibre.name: High Calibre Rounds
highCalibre.description: Your primary weapon deals 50% more damage
